description.en_US: Includes a new late-game quest and pet that were once exclusive to the Nintendo Switch!
description.pt_BR: Inclui uma nova missão e pet no final do jogo, que antes eram exclusivos do Nintendo Switch!
description.de_DE: Beinhaltet eine neue Quest und einen neuen Begleiter, einst exklusiv für die Nintendo Switch!<<C<<Geprüft: Minsu
description.zh_CN: Nintendo Switch独占，包括一个游戏后期任务和一只宠物！<<A<<[CHANGED 2020/07/15]
description.zh_TW: NintendoSwitch獨佔，包括一個遊戲後期任務和一隻寵物！<<A<<[CHANGED 2020/07/15]
description.ja_JP:
Nintendo Switchだけの
新しい終盤クエストとペット！<<A<<[CHANGED 2020/07/15]
description.ko_KR: Nintendo Switch 전용 게임 후반 신규 퀘스트와 펫으로 구성되어 있습니다!<<A<<[CHANGED 2020/07/15]
